about_the_game:
Hello everyone, we are pleased to announce the Special Forces package. This is a set of additional tools for Survival players.

The Special Forces package includes the following digital items:

- Access to the unique trader in the game

- Access to exclusive products

- Access to exclusive weapons

- Unique sets of clothes and equipment

- 4 unique helmets

- Bonus game currency +200000

- volume of inventory slots +40

This list can be expanded over time, so stay tuned!
Thank you all for your support.
